result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Juan Antonio Garza-Libores

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Juan Antonio Garza-Libores appeared by video.  Attorney Spiros Stavros Nicolet appeared by video for Juan Antonio Garza-Libores.  Prosecuting attorney Elaine B. Fehrs appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Pretrial Conference held.  Defense counsel requests adjourned pretrial conference.  Case adjourned, Br. 41.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Received and Filed. Victim No Contact Order Statement

Cash bail previously posted to be returned to remitter.
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with MGRV (DOB 12-30-1994).
No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Defendant Juan Antonio Garza-Libores in court.  Attorney Spiros Stavros Nicolet in court for Juan Antonio Garza-Libores.  Prosecuting attorney Olivia Simmons in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Sworn as interpreter: Natalia Fajardo
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Skwierawski, Branch 41.  
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to Defendant's attorney. Defendant plead not guilty.  
Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 41.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Adjustment Number: 22A 093732,
Payable Number: 1036299,
Receipt Number: 22RP039581,
Amount: $20.00

Defendant Juan Antonio Garza-Libores not in court. Student Intern Abigail Doweiko in court under the supervision of Prosecuting attorney Thomas L. Potter available by telephone for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued. Upon arrest, defendant is ordered remanded to a commissioner. Court ordered any bail on deposit to be forfeited. Court makes a finding that there is a possible victim identified and stays the forfeiture order with restitution to be determined at close of case.
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 9-30-2022 @1p
